text: Rishivamsham is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Rajeev Anchal, starring Vijayaraghavan and Chanchal in the lead role. ==Cast== * Madhupal * Narendra Prasad * Vijayaraghavan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Rishivamsham
